alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:32PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Miramar to near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 to 7 miles northeast of Shark Valley Obs Tower. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Miami Gardens, Weston, Doral, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, Medley, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North, Sunshine Acres, Country Club and Pennsuco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
